awe6.interfaces.IAgendaManager

type
interface
Objects intending to provide an Agenda driven state machine should implement this interface.

Instance Variables

agenda(__get_agenda,null) : EAgenda

The object's current agenda.

Instance Methods

setAgenda( type : EAgenda ) : Bool

parameters
type The new agenda. If none is specified will assign to EAgenda.ALWAYS.
returns
Returns true if the agenda has changed, false otherwise.
Change the object's current agenda.
